entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 2:49 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 2. Forecast issued 1:59 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 1:59 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 1:59 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
